name: Digital Subscription
description:
Our subscribers help keep the magazine running!

BLACKBERRY: a magazine is published twice a year on June 15 and December 15. Your subscription will begin with the current issue and will automatically renew each year. 

Digital Subscriptions will be sent directly your inbox in PDF form. (Most PDFs may also be read on e-readers and iPads.) 

For additional questions concerning your subscription, please email editor@blackberryamagazine.com

name: Print Subscription
description:
Our subscribers help keep the magazine running!

BLACKBERRY: a magazine is published twice a year on June 15 and December 15. Your subscription will begin with the current issue and will automatically renew each year. 

Digital Subscriptions will be sent directly your inbox in PDF form. (Most PDFs may also be read on e-readers and iPads.) 

Print Subscriptions also include digital editions of the magazine. 

For additional questions concerning your subscription, please email editor@blackberryamagazine.com

name: BLACKBERRY: a magazine, Vol. 2, Issue 2, "Open"
description:
68 pages of poetry, fiction, and nonfiction by: Nadia Alexis, Jacquese Armstrong, Atlas Brown, Gyasi Byng, Tia Clark, Eve Ewing, Sherese Francis, Juliana Goodman, Thalia Harris, Danielle Jackson, Nashae Jones, Yasmina Martin, L. Nkwoma Masi, Jaime Moore, Kaneisha Payton, Bonita Lee Penn, Phallon Perry, Ramona Pina, Michelle Reese, Kiyatana Sapp, Margie Shaheed, Shakeema Smalls, Pamela Taylor, Esme-Michelle Watkins, and Anne Wolf.

September's issue also features a review of "Hymn for the Black Terrific" by Kiki Petrosino of Sarabande Books.
